alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 14 at 3:28AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (2.8 to 12.3 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Essex MA, Suffolk MA, Eastern Norfolk MA, Eastern Plymouth MA and Barnstable MA Counties. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...only minor inundation and erosion is expected around the time of high tide early Wednesday morning. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Barnstable; Eastern Essex; Eastern Norfolk; Eastern Plymouth; Suffolk
